name: Tuner (fancy)
description: Provides four simultaneous tuners using an autocorrelation pitch detection method. CPU heavy but reliable for most signals. Supports microtuning via Scala/MTS.

parameters.name: Channel 1
parameters.description: The input bus for tuner number 1 (0=disabled).

parameters.name: Channel 2
parameters.description: The input bus for tuner number 2 (0=disabled).

parameters.name: Channel 3
parameters.description: The input bus for tuner number 3 (0=disabled).

parameters.name: Channel 4
parameters.description: The input bus for tuner number 4 (0=disabled).

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: Sets the range of pitches which can be tracked. Set appropriately for the lowest note.

parameters.name: Track bias
parameters.description: Internal pitch tracking parameter to help avoid octave errors.

parameters.name: Env threshold
parameters.description: Signal threshold (dB) below which pitch tracking is disabled.
